name: Seated Machine Side Lateral Raise
instructions: Sit on the lateral raise machine and select the weight.
Adjust the seat height so that your shoulders are in line with the machine's pivot points.
Place your arms against the pads, with your elbows bent at a 90-degree angle.
Keep your back straight and your feet flat on the floor.
Lift your arms out to the sides, pushing against the pads until your arms are parallel to the floor. Exhale as you perform this movement.
Pause for a moment at the top of the movement.
Slowly lower your arms back to the starting position while inhaling.
Repeat for the recommended number of repetitions.
